ygData.subject: Re: FD Failure Part II
ygData.msgSnippet: I play on Test Server, and about clerics not being able to cast buffs, I don t think that s true. I had a cleric cast a Center and Spirit armor on me just last
ygData.messageBody:
I play on Test Server, and about clerics not being able to cast buffs, I don't think that's true. I had a cleric cast a Center and Spirit armor on me just last night and I wasn't grouped with her.

We have noticed buffs not lasting as long and have complained to the high heavens about that. I just got FD, so I'm still working with it.

-----Original Message-----
From: V-Tech <wsilk@...>
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, July 30, 1999 1:46 PM
Subject: [EQ-Monks] FD Failure Part II


Well, one person has seen the effects since the last patch. Please speak up and give stories if your having a tough time with it.

I am just very curious if Verant made a change in the ability to FD without stating it. I bet they would call this an "ENHANCEMENT" wouldn't they.

Oh, and the durations of Buff spells really really dissapoints me. I thought they were good as is before the patch. Have to rebuff after ever other fight. Very annoying to the casters in my group.

Axlon hooks up his mana sieve to Jhessa (Very lovely Barbarian Shaman that she is)


And one rumor I heard..is that Clerics can not cast buffs on ya unless you are grouped with them. Can anyone confirm this?


Axlon Stormbringer
